Author: temporarymoodswings
Text: >Now I envy the women who don’t fit the mold of “skinny” and actually just don’t care/are unbothered by it. But I feel like I know too much now, about weight, calories, etc. I can’t unlearn it. All of this just feels inevitable, and sometimes I wish I at least could get a moment of satisfaction from it.  This.

Author: thoughtfulfox
Text: I can’t find all the words right now. Just know that this really hit home hard for me. I’m no longer “thin”. I’ve gained a lot in the past year (my ED cycles with long bouts of BED followed by shorter bouts of anorexic tendencies).  Your comment about wanting a safety net connects with me so hard. It’ll never be a low enough weight because I will always want to feel safer and my biggest issue with my current weight probably has a lot to do with how unsafe I feel.
